item.title: April’s Pastry Box thought on writing
item.description: I was slow to post aboutmy April Pastry Box post as my realign got in the way. It was really a little insecure thought about how my writing and thinking is improving, but I’m finding it hard. [ ](https://the-pastry-box-project.net/laura-kalbag/2014-april-19)
